comment: Johnny deserves everything back that was taken from him by that evil bitch Amber Turd, and this is just only one of the things.  She took his pride as well as his dignity as well.  He made him look and feel  like less than the warm big hearted poerson that we all know him to be yet she took advantage of that and played and toyed with it in her own sick, twisted psychotic way.  Careful A.H.  the karma bus is headed your way and I bet Johnny Depp will be the driver!
user.description: I am a 53 yr old  writer and a pirate lover at heart.  I will always love and admire Johnny!  I will support and do whatever I can for him.  I'm currently working on a piece for him as we speak.
commentable_entity.ask: Give The Captain His Exit! Rehire Johnny Depp for Pirates 6.
commentable_entity.title: Give The Captain His Exit! Rehire Johnny Depp for Pirates 6.
commentable_entity.description:
In light of recent events, such as the “Remove Amber Heard From Aquaman 2” petition reaching an astonishing two million signatures and counting, a new idea has surfaced; a movement that should fit hand-in-hand: Give The Captain His Exit. 



   Could you imagine, if a character you had built from the ground up, and had portrayed nearly two decades, was simply torn from your grasp? As if it were nothing at all, and now YOU were the bad guy?

This is WRONG!

   Johnny Depp has endured, from what the public court case has shown, many hardships, and many instances of abuse—too many.

   A quote, if you will, from Pirates of The Caribbean: At World’s End, “Just close your eyes and pretend it’s all a bad dream. That’s how I get by.”

   Even from a young age, life for Johnny hadn’t been easy, this round’s price being not only the tip of his finger, but his entire life’s work. This man has brought joy and wonder into millions of our lives, proven by how strongly everyone has fought to remove Amber Heard from Aquaman 2, and Disney has betrayed him, in his greatest time of need!

   After everything Johnny has given us; the hours, days, weeks, years of his life, undoubtedly his blood, sweat, and tears, all of it given away to us in order to create absolute masterpieces of fantasy, horror, romance and more?

We can NOT let the abusers win!

   To see the joy it would bring Johnny, to bring his justice full circle, and to give him our everything as he gave to us, as well as taking Disney down a notch while we’re at it? That’s worth fighting for.

Do the right thing.

Return the role of Captain Jack Sparrow back to Johnny Depp, where it could only ever truly belong.
commentable_entity.letter_body: Give The Captain His Exit! Rehire Johnny Depp for Pirates 6.
commentable_entity.display_title: Give The Captain His Exit! Rehire Johnny Depp for Pirates 6.
commentable_entity.petition_title: Give The Captain His Exit! Rehire Johnny Depp for Pirates 6.
